project_type.label: Project/Service Type
project_type.placeholder: e.g., Critical Care Consulting, ICU Management, Compliance Audit

client_challenges.label: Client's Key Challenges
client_challenges.help: List 3-5 key problems the client is facing
library:
• High patient-to-provider ratios leading to burnout
• Inconsistent clinical documentation standards
• Compliance gaps in billing and coding

• Staff turnover and retention issues
• Outdated clinical protocols and procedures
• Poor interdepartmental communication and coordination

• Rising readmission rates
• Patient safety concerns and adverse events
• Low patient satisfaction scores (HCAHPS)

project_objectives.label: Project Objectives
project_objectives.help: List 3-5 objectives this project will achieve
library:
• Improve clinical documentation accuracy by 30%
• Reduce staff turnover by 20% within 12 months
• Achieve 100% compliance with regulatory standards

• Decrease readmission rates by 15%
• Improve HCAHPS scores from 60th to 75th percentile
• Standardize clinical protocols across all units

• Optimize provider scheduling and workload distribution
• Implement evidence-based best practices
• Enhance team communication and collaboration
